Firestorm-Zardus....gone

::he looks down to the ground,a spark of anger lights up::

Firestorm-the maximalls will pay for this,defense grid offline and 
reactivate in 20 nanoclicks

::he flys out of the base and heads toward the alliance base::

Megaprime-Im guessing Zardus isnt dead and hes off somewhere,whatever you do 
DONT tell Firestorm that.When he is focused because of anger he can haul 
a$$.(still speaking over the line)Keep him focused and the maximall death 
toll will shoot up like a fire with gas.ill be here monorting the area 
around our base megaprime out

<<<<Firestorm in the sky >>>>

Firestorm-They may have killed you zardus but though you died the alliegance 
will live on

::he lands and enters the base looking for some of the crew::
